entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Golden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:07 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Golden Airport 06:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

Humidity: 92 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 70 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High plus 1.
